definition: row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
to walk/to go/to run/to move (of vehicle)/to visit/to leave/to go away/to die (euph.)/from/through/away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])/to change (shape, form, meaning)

sentences.english: Chinese astronaut has become the first in his country's history to take a space walk.
sentences.chinese: 中國完成了中國航天史上第一次太空行走。

sentences.english: Space walk on the safety tethers.
Jian Shilong, director of China Maritime Tracking and Control Department, said the ships would track and support Shenzhou VII, and monitor the spacewalk.
sentences.chinese: 定位船將負責跟蹤支援神舟七號，並指揮太空行走。

sentences.english: This is also in our country astronautics history implements for the first time spaces walk.
sentences.chinese: 這也是我國航天史上首次實施太空行走。

sentences.english: Two spacewalking astronauts finished the wiring job today.
sentences.chinese: 今天2名太空行走的宇航員完成了配線工作。

sentences.english: Zhai Zhigang is famous as the first man who walked in space in China.
sentences.chinese: 翟志剛作爲中國太空行走第一人而聞名。

sentences.english: What do you feel about space walk(EVA)?
sentences.chinese: 在太空行走的感覺是什麼？

sentences.english: They completed a six-and-a-half hour spacewalk on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 他們星期二完成了6個半小時的太空行走。

sentences.english: Zhai Zhigang is the first Chinese astronaut to walk in the outer space.
sentences.chinese: 翟志剛是第一個在外太空行走的中國航天員。

sentences.english: The astronaut space walked half an hour.
sentences.chinese: 宇宙航行員在太空行走了半小時。

sentences.english: The spacewalk was mainly aimed at testing China's mastery of the technology involved.
sentences.chinese: 這次太空行走旨在檢測中國對航天技術的掌握情況。

sentences.english: And if you don't score well then you're not allowed to do stuff like go on a spacewalk?
sentences.chinese: 那如果你分不高就不能做一些太空行走之類的作業了？

sentences.english: Astronauts on a spacewalk cannot whistle.
sentences.chinese: 太空行走的宇航員不能吹口哨。

sentences.english: Mission Specialists Dave Williams and Rick Mastracchio are preparing for their second spacewalk.
sentences.chinese: 最後就是第二次太空行走，準備中。

sentences.english: Don't hit your own spacewalker or it will cost you some missiles.
sentences.chinese: 不要打自己的太空行走，或將花費你一些導彈。

definition: moon landing/to land on the moon
